title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
SR:
1. Open the application and navigate to the layout view.
2. Import an image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout view.
3. Delete the 'image1.jpg' file from the outline image.
4. Rename 'image2.jpg' as 'image1.jpg' and place it in the same location as the original 'image1.jpg'.
